title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.5 - Determination of prize winners
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5006.5 - Determination of prize winners

State Regulations
(a) The
rub-off coating covering the play area on the ticket is to be rubbed off to
determine winning or losing status as described in the appropriate game
brochure. (b) No portion of the
display printing nor any extraneous matter whatsoever shall be usable or
playable as a part of the instant game. The validation number is not a play
symbol and may not be utilized as such. (c) In all events, the determination of prize
winners shall be subject to the ticket validation requirements set forth in
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5006.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
